trans-unit.source: Describes the context in which a set of schema is bound to .NET Framework code entities.
trans-unit.target: 描述要在其中一組結構描述繫結至.NET Framework 程式碼實體的內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.ImportContext"></xref> class for the given code identifiers, with the given type-sharing option.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.ImportContext"></xref>類別指定的程式碼識別項，以指定的型別共用選項。

trans-unit.source: The code entities to which the context applies.
trans-unit.target: 套用內容的程式碼實體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that determines whether custom types are shared among schema.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>值，決定是否在結構描述之間共用的自訂型別。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether custom types are shared.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，決定是否共用的自訂型別。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if custom types are shared among schema; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果自訂類型所共用的結構描述;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of code entities to which the context applies.
trans-unit.target: 取得一組套用內容的程式碼實體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers"></xref> that specifies the code entities to which the context applies.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers"> </xref> ，指定套用內容的程式碼實體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of warnings that are generated when importing the code entity descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的匯入程式碼實體描述時，所產生的警告。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> that contains warnings that were generated when importing the code entity descriptions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含匯入程式碼實體描述時所產生的警告。
